divs: sighting detailsi work 2nd shift at lockheed martin aircraft (so i do know planes)in fort worth,texas.on my way home (i have a 75 mile one way commute) as i was apporoaching a private air port in a gated sub-division named bourland field just off of hwy 377 heading west towards the towns of cresson then granbury on a low cloud foggy night which the fog was above me over head some 200 feet or so a black triangle craft crossed across hwy 377 towards the bourland field runway going south. it turned above the runway looking as though it was going to land heading north but when it rreached the end of the runway it turned 90 degrees left to the west but then turned abruptly 180 degrees back to the east all in near one move.it sat in place just over the landing beacon next to the first east most house in the division. i had stopped and got out of my car in the turn lane adjacent to the beacon and stood and watched the triangle for over three minutes as it sat in air making no sound whatsoever.along with the nose and wing type lights it had a muted white light dead center underneath the craft. i was about 60 or 70 yards away from the craft and it was about 100 feet or less in the air.i could see it clearly it had no tail section it had no engine flame or propeller visible .it was a narrow tapered triangle .the light on the bottom i at first thought it must of been for landing gear but no doors were open that i could see. others seen it as cars were passing behind me but no one else stopped. i was in no hurry as it takes me a hour and a half to get home anyway. this is the 3rd such siting i've had in the last three years.the first was around 2 years ago in the spring and on my way home i seen a giant triangle that was at least a mile across in each direction hovering in place more than a mile up in the air on a moonlite (3\4) semi-cloudy night.it was april or may in 2006 over the town of glen rose,texas. it had no lights that i could see but stood out more because no light was reflecting off of it like it was on the clouds.this thing was a monster. i told my co-workers the next day at work about the latest siting and they kidded me about little green men and flying saucers etc..un til one of my other co-workers said that she too had seen it but thought it was some nasa drone (as she does still to this day) ownly when the news in the past few days has been up in arms about ufo's in stephenville texas has anyone thought me as crazy .so i've been vendicated and i'm only slightly old aged crazed now. that's my story .the 3rd sighting was also on hwy 377 just out of benbrook texas where one trianle(again) split off into 3 pieces the outer two flew up into the sky so fast they disappeared .
